title: Deutsche Telekom bullish on Sprint - T-Mobile deal
text:
Deutsche Telekom bullish on Sprint - T-Mobile deal 01:18
Deutsche Telekom CEO Tim Hoettges expressed confidence that the $26 billion takeover of Sprint by its U.S. unit T-Mobile US would clear anti-trust hurdles. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Deutsche Telekom CEO Tim Hoettges expressed confidence that the $26 billion takeover of Sprint by its U.S. unit T-Mobile US would clear anti-trust hurdles. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
